entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 6:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
